arts.ttl: Oxford boost Championship survival hopes with win at Sheffield Wednesday
arts.sum: Sam Long’s 79th-minute header was enough to secure the win and take Oxford five points clear of the relegation zone with four games remaining.

arts.ttl: Sam Long header gives U’s important stride to Championship safety
arts.sum: OXFORD United took an important stride to Sky Bet Championship safety as Sam Long’s header secured all three points at Sheffield Wednesday.

arts.ttl: Joe Bennett ready to step in and help fill void set to be left by Ciaron Brown
arts.sum: JOE Bennett is ready to step in and help fill the void set to be left by Oxford United teammate Ciaron Brown.

arts.ttl: Latest from Germany: Cesc Fabregas now in picture with Crystal Palace and Sheffield Wednesday managers for RB Leipzig
arts.sum: Cesc Fabregas has been added to RB Leipzig’s list of potential managerial appointments alongside Sheffield Wednesday’s Danny Rohl and Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner. That’s according to journalist Philipp Hinze, who reports that the former Premier League star, currently manager at Como, now finds himself on the list at the German side.
